alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 3:41PM EST until March 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches is the Advisory area with a few locally higher amounts over the northern and eastern Catskills * WHERE...Southern Vermont, northwestern Connecticut, the Capital Region, Taconics, Helderbergs, mid Hudson Valley, Schoharie Valley, eastern Catskills in east central New York and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized snowfall rates of a half an inch to an inch an hour are possible in some locations. The snow will taper to scattered snow showers and flurries early this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
